name: PianoRadio
0:
”Alexa, open Piano Radio”
”Alexa, ask Piano Radio for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Piano Radio”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: piano radio
des: Our world is busy enough. Listen to music that will restore you! You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
